title: Aru Hi Totsuzen, Gal No Iinazuke Ga Dekita
alternative_title: ある日、突然ギャルの許嫁ができた ; Aru hi Totsuzen, Gyaru no Iinazuke ga Dekita ; One Day, I Suddenly Got Myself a Gal Fiancée​ ; One Day, Out of the Blue, I Got a Gal's Forgiving Wife
status: ある日、突然ギャルの許嫁ができた ; Aru hi Totsuzen, Gyaru no Iinazuke ga Dekita ; One Day, I Suddenly Got Myself a Gal Fiancée​ ; One Day, Out of the Blue, I Got a Gal's Forgiving Wife
description:
Description :
        "Hey, hey, why are you always pretending to be asleep?"Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancee!?A school romantic comedy between two polar opposites, Yin and Yang, has begun!
